property.name: Preferred label
property.description: The skos:prefLabel property makes it possible to assign a preferred lexical label to a resource.

property.name: Preferred label
property.description: The skos:altLabel property makes it possible to assign an alternative lexical label to a resource. This is especially helpful when assigning labels beyond the one that is preferred for the concept, for instance when synonyms need to be represented.

property.name: Definition
property.description: skos:definition supplies a complete explanation of the intended meaning of a resource.

property.name: Resource's scheme
property.description: Concepts can be created and used as stand-alone entities. However, especially in indexing practice, concepts usually come in carefully compiled vocabularies, such as thesauri or classification schemes. SKOS offers the means of representing such KOSs using the skos:ConceptScheme class.

property.name: Top concept Of
property.description: This property allows one to link a concept to the concept scheme containing it.
